lead_paragraph: Tom Watson won the Outback Steakhouse Pro-Am yesterday at Lutz, Fla., closing with a one-under-par 70 in cold and windy conditions. Watson finished at four-under 209, a stroke ahead of Jay Haas and Andy Bean, for his ninth career Champions Tour title.
